title: Bijoux Resort in Kalpitiya
details: Operating since Christmas Day 2015 this bijoux resort is located half way up Sri Lanka’s west coast, boasting some of the world’s best kitesurfing conditions. 80 Perches of land with the main building that offers 4 bedrooms, 2 with AC and 2 upstairs without AC, set around a beautiful pool. Each room has a large Dutch antique 4 poster bed, a day bed that can be made up as a single bed, sitting area and en suite. There is a communal Ambalama for dining and relaxing. A large kitchen and store room and office. Pool room and common toilet. Behind this is a large garden area and the staff rooms/bathroom/laundry. There is plenty of room for further development – a yoga shall or massage room for example.The property is not beachfront but 5 minutes from the lagoon where all the kite surfing happens, and is near several well known kites surfing schools. It is about 10 minutes from Kalpitiya town, and 3 hours from the airport.
